trophies.trophyDetail: Congratulations!  Your skill, dedication, and determination have propelled you to the ultimate trophy. You are now officially crowned as the Turbo Dash Kart Champion! Enjoy your well-deserved glory and relish in the memories of your exhilarating racing journey.
Pass the first run. Kickstart your Turbo Dash Kart 2023 Racing adventure by successfully crossing the starting line in your very first race. It's the beginning of an exhilarating journey!
Buy first kart. Expand your kart collection by purchasing your very first kart. It's the first step towards building your racing empire.
Improve one detail of the kart. Enhance the performance of your kart by upgrading one of its crucial details. Feel the difference as your kart gains an edge on the racetrack.
Finish first in five races. Display your racing prowess and secure the top position in five exhilarating races. Leave your opponents in the dust and revel in your victories.
Use nitro in five races. Unleash the power of nitro and experience a burst of incredible speed in five races. Leave your opponents trailing behind as you blaze through the tracks.
Use sticky bomb in five races. Employ strategic tactics and wreak havoc on your rivals by using sticky bombs in five races. Watch as chaos unfolds and secure your advantage.
Use rocket in five races. Unleash devastating rockets upon your opponents and watch them crumble under the explosive force in five races. Make your mark with precision and power.
Use shield in five races. Shield yourself from incoming attacks and race with confidence by utilizing shields in five races. Become an unstoppable force on the track.
Buy 3 karts. Expand your collection further by acquiring a total of three karts. Each kart offers unique characteristics and advantages to enhance your racing experience.
Upgrade all kart details to level 5. Unleash the full potential of your karts by upgrading all their details to the maximum level of 5. Experience the pinnacle of performance and speed.
Drive 20 races. Prove your dedication and passion for racing by participating in a total of 20 thrilling races. Your experience and skill will shine through on the track.
Spend 50,000 coins. Show your commitment to improving your racing experience by spending a total of 50,000 coins on upgrades and enhancements.
Finish first in 10 races. Establish your supremacy on the racetrack by clinching first place in 10 challenging races. Show everyone that you are the ultimate champion.
Blow up 15 enemies. Master the art of precision and destruction by blowing up a total of 15 enemies with your explosive arsenal. Leave a trail of chaos and emerge victorious.
Upgrade all parts of 2 karts to level 5. Showcase your attention to detail and dedication to perfection by upgrading all parts of two karts to the maximum level of 5.
Spend 75,000 coins. Manage your finances wisely and spend a total of 75,000 coins on various upgrades and items. Build your racing empire with careful investments.
Buy 5 characters. Expand your roster of racers by purchasing a total of five unique characters. Each character brings their own style and personality to the races.
Buy 10 characters. Take your character collection to new heights by purchasing a total of 10 unique and diverse characters. Show off your impressive lineup on the racetrack.
Earn 500,000 Coins. Amass a fortune through your racing skills and accumulate a total of 500,000 coins. Enjoy the benefits of your wealth and continue to fuel your racing ambitions.
Finish first in 50 races. Reach a significant milestone in your racing career by participating in a total of 50 thrilling races. Celebrate your progress and look forward to more exciting adventures.
Buy 5 karts. Expand your kart collection and become a true kart enthusiast by purchasing a total of five distinct and powerful karts. Each kart brings its own strengths to the race.
Use shield in 10 races. Master the art of defensive racing and utilize shields in a total of 10 races. Keep your opponents at bay and protect your position on the leaderboard.
Use rocket in 10 races. Become a master of strategic attacks and employ rockets in a total of 10 races. Launch precision strikes and leave your rivals in awe of your skills.
Use sticky bomb in 10 races. Embrace chaos and wreak havoc on the racetrack by using sticky bombs in a total of 10 races. Create explosions that will echo through the course.
